properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 9:02AM PST until March 4 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts to 30 kt and seas 8 to
13 ft.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Pt Arena out 10 nm.

* WHEN...Until noon Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING HAS EXPIRED
